[Open Source Science for Data Processing and Archives Workshop](https://science.nasa.gov/researchers/science-data/open-source-science-workshop)

On October 14, 2021 from 12:00pm - 3:00pm ET, NASA will be holding a virtual workshop on the Open Source Science Initiative which is part of NASA's [Strategy for Data Management and Computing for Groundbreaking Science 2019-2024](https://science.nasa.gov/science-pink/s3fs-public/atoms/files/Crawford_information_policy_MOE_June2021.pdf).  The workshop will also introduce NASA's Transform to Open Science (TOPS) initiative to help jump start the adoption of open science across NASA's data communities. See the [announcement](https://science.nasa.gov/researchers/science-data/open-source-science-workshop) for full details. Open to the public.
